mapper.sql: id, agent_name, trade_amount, trade_count, agent_id, log_id, gmt_created, gmt_modified
mapper.insert: insert into tb_trade_import_detail(agent_name, trade_amount, trade_count, agent_id, log_id, is_original, gmt_created, gmt_modified) values ( #{agentName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tradeAmount, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{tradeCount, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{agentId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{logId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isOriginal, jdbcType=TINYINT}, now(), now() )
mapper.select:
SELECT
from tb_trade_import_detail where log_id = #{logId, jdbcType=INTEGER} order by gmt_created desc
